Album: 七つの大罪 オリジナル・サウンドトラック 2

[01:32.80]So let's share the perfect time, For you and me

[02:01.88]You can't ignore how your feel inside
[02:07.39]I can't wait to see them all from my heart
[02:14.62]Take my hand
[02:17.22]So show your smile
[02:18.79]I will stay with you so
[02:23.37]Oh You are the one I've got to hide
